snippet: American authorities can now seek to recover $330 million of more than $7 billion stolen by R. Allen Stanford, who was convicted of running a Ponzi scheme.
abstract: Texas jury clears the way for American authorities to try to recover $330 million of more than $7 billion stolen by R Allen Stanford, who was convicted of running a Ponzi scheme.
lead_paragraph: American authorities can now seek to recover $330 million of more than $7 billion stolen by R. Allen Stanford, who was convicted of running a Ponzi scheme.

headline.seo: Texas Jury Approves Pursuit of Money From Stanford Fraud
headline.main: U.S. Is Cleared to Seek Funds in Fraud Case
